title: Beautiful Beginnings Adjustable Baby Wrist Link Rein Restrain Safety Toddler Walking in Assorted Color (18m-4yrs)
features: KEEP YOUR CHILD WITHIN REACH -- Beautiful beginnings child's safety wrist link helps keep your child close to you when in crowded places.
EASY TO USE -- It acts almost like a harness. It comes on a blister pack with a display hook for business use.
ASSORTED COLOURS -- Comes in the colour: assorted colours.
SUITABLE FOR AGES -- Suitable for children aged 18 months to 4 years.
Package contents: 1 unit of Beautiful Beginnings Adjustable Baby Wrist Link Rein Restrain Safety Toddler Walking, assorted colours. Actual packaging may vary.
description: Beautiful Beginnings Adjustable Baby Wrist Link Rein Suppression Safety Toddler Running in Navy Wrist link helps keep your child close to you in crowded places Suitable for those aged 18 months to 4 years APPROXIMATELY 81CM LONG IN TOTAL LENGTH BETWEEN YOU WANT THE CHILD TO BE APPROXIMATELY 50 60CM Instructions for use hold the link The short part of the webbing the piece under the buckle up through the middle of the Buckle goes then pull forward threading through the front part of the buckle the side with the tab This is now certain Pop your child s wrist and pull to secure you don t need to undo it again just pop your little hand through and pull the webbing to secure and slide to release EASY TO USE WITH INSTRUCTIONS AND SAFETY GUIDANCE ON BACK WITH PACK
